headline: Lime Fluff
name: Lime Fluff
description: A Georgia favorite! Great with everything! Make a lot for large gatherings, it disappears quickly! You can use any kind of nuts you like; adjust the amount to suit your preference.
recipeIngredient: 1 (6 ounce) package lime flavored Jell-O® mix
1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
1 (20 ounce) can crushed pineapple with juice

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, mix together gelatin, whipped topping, pineapple with juice, sour cream, marshmallows, and pecans. Cover and chill in refrigerator for at least 1 hour. Serve cold.
